## Loading mzXML data from the Grinta! study

```{r define_project_root, include=FALSE}

if(!require("rprojroot")) install.packages("rprojroot", dependencies = TRUE)
library(rprojroot)
root <- rprojroot::find_root_file(criterion = is_rstudio_project)
root
```

```{r}

```

## A heatmap
```{r}
library(MSnbase)
## a set of spectra of interest: MS1 spectra eluted
## between 30 and 35 minutes retention time
ms1 <- which(hd$msLevel == 1)
rtsel <- hd$retentionTime[ms1] / 60 > 5 &
    hd$retentionTime[ms1] / 60 < 30


??MSmap

## the map
M <- MSmap(ms, ms1[rtsel], 400, 500, 0.5, hd)

## 1

plot(M, aspect = 1, allTicks = FALSE)

plot3D(M)


M_df <- as.data.frame(signature(from = M, to = "data.frame"))

?`plot3D,MSmap-method`

```








```{r}
fileName(mz)
 runInfo(mz_list)
 close(mz)

mzxml <- system.file(paste0("", 
                     package = "msdata")
aa <- openMSfile(mzxml) ## ramp, default backend

## ----get header information-------------------------------------------------------------
runInfo(aa)
instrumentInfo(aa)
header(aa,1)

## ----plotspectrum-----------------------------------------------------------------------
pl <- peaks(aa,10)
peaksCount(aa,10)
head(pl)
plot(pl[,1], pl[,2], type="h", lwd=1)

## ----close the file---------------------------------------------------------------------
close(aa)

## ----openid-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
library(mzR)
library(msdata)

file <- system.file("mzid", "Tandem.mzid.gz", package="msdata")
x <- openIDfile(file)

## ----metadata---------------------------------------------------------------------------
mzidInfo(x)

## ----psms0------------------------------------------------------------------------------
p <- psms(x)
colnames(p)

## ----psms1------------------------------------------------------------------------------
m <- modifications(x)
head(m)

## ----psms2------------------------------------------------------------------------------
scr <- score(x)
colnames(scr)

## ----label=sessioninfo, results='asis', echo=FALSE--------------------------------------
toLatex(sessionInfo())




```
